title: Grantha Part Schema
description: Schema for a single content part of a multi-part grantha. Contains content arrays and identifiers. Versioned using semantic versioning.

schema_version.description: Version of this schema in semver format (MAJOR.MINOR.PATCH). Major version changes indicate breaking schema changes.

grantha_id.description: The ID of the parent grantha this part belongs to.

part_num.description: The sequential number of this part within the grantha.

oneOf.description: Map of commentary_id to commentary object (preferred format)
